title: Crab, mango, lime and chilli salad
description: A vibrant crab dish with a zesty dressing.
ingredients: 2 red chillies, seeds removed, finely chopped
2cm/½in fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped
2 ripe mangoes, stones removed, thinly sliced
4 kaffir lime leaves, finely chopped, to serve
